LanguageData.HighlandCow.label: highland cow
LanguageData.HighlandCow.description: Highland cattle have long horns and wavy coats of fur. They are very hardy breed of cattle and adapt at living in harsh environments. Highlands are primarily bred for their high quality milk.
LanguageData.HighlandCow.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.HighlandCow.tools.2.label: left hoof
LanguageData.HighlandCow.tools.3.label: right hoof
